nodes.text: Prefsbelt Fleet Camp, also known simply as Prefsbelt Academy, was a naval academy located on the planet of Prefsbelt IV, in the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories. Originally affiliated with the Galactic Republic, it became a part of the Galactic Empire's military training program after the Clone Wars. Notable alumni of the Prefsbelt Academy included Wilhuff Tarkin, Dodd Rancit, and Rae Sloane.
